alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 24 at 2:58PM PST until February 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATER SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches possible, with heaviest accumulations mainly over north and eastern Clark County. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia and Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From later Saturday evening into Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
